ygData.subject: RE: mip = many innapropriate pictures?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oh - and FYI, don t try to burn disks in the background while you re playing.... That can cause... a few problems. *chuckles* But what s really interesting
ygData.messageBody:
At 04:21 PM 2/28/00 -0800, you wrote:
>From: John Tatsukawa <jht@...>
>
>This is unrelated to this particular problem, but I'd recommend that you
>remove "Fast Find" from your startup folder in Windows.
>
>This little program, installed mostly by default by MS Office, searches your
>drives and can cause heavy disk activity at the most inconvenient times. But
>like I said, I'm sure this is *not* the cause in this case, but I always
>make sure this program never gets loaded on my computers.

Oh - and FYI, don't try to burn disks in the background while you're
playing.... That can cause... a few problems.

*chuckles*
But what's really interesting is that the noises from that program can
still be heard, despite the wolf howls and spell sounds...

Talies the cdburner
